name: Botchers
description:
Botchers is an explosive local multiplayer action game for 2 to 4 players.

Be quick and mischievous to survive your friends in arenas full of deadly traps.

Play as a deadly (but cute!) gun-saber-equipped robot and use the environment to eliminate your opponents in fast-paced games.

Disclaimer

Botchers is currently in its alpha state. There are known bugs and some features are still in development but it's already fully enjoyable.

What's planned ahead?

My current plan is to release the finished game late 2020. The full game will contain the following:

  • 5 environments each with unique mechanics
  • 20+ levels
  • Level editor
  • Team deathmatch mode
Will it stay free?

For now the alpha will be patched until it's mostly bug free. Featurewise, the level editor and some environments will only be available in the commercial version.

I want to play online!

With the current situation there is good reason why your friends can't come and play at home. You can use Parsec to play remotely as if you were on the same machine. I have used it to playtest the game and it works like a charm.

How to play?

The goal is to score 7 kills in one game. Avoid traps. Avoid incoming dangers. Don't fall. Stay alive.

Controls Action Gamepad Keyboard Movement WASD or ARROWS Dash Space Shoot L Slash J Grab/Catch object K Throw object Hold while grabbing
